Medium.title: Missing MIME Type Protection Header
Medium.recommendation: Enable the X-Content-Type-Options header with the value 'nosniff' to prevent content-type confusion attacks.

Medium.title: Missing Clickjacking Protection Header
Medium.recommendation: Implement the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy frame-ancestors directive to prevent UI redressing attacks.

Medium.title: Missing Clickjacking Protection Header
Medium.recommendation: Implement the X-Frame-Options or Content-Security-Policy frame-ancestors directive to prevent UI redressing attacks.
